mapper.insert: insert into t_product11(p_show_date, p_tk_count, p_seat_info, p_prod_check, p_img_route, p_deal_method, p_tk_possession, p_deal_check, p_min_bid, p_pay, p_date) values(#{p_show_date},#{p_tk_count},#{p_seat_info},#{p_prod_check},#{p_img_route},#{p_deal_method} ,#{p_tk_possession},#{p_deal_check},#{p_min_bid},#{p_pay},#{p_date})
